guest_info.name: Joel Schaub
guest_info.title: Vice President of Lending
guest_info.specialty: Giving back part of his commission to clients

main_topics: Impact of bank failures on mortgage rates
Importance of client events and partnerships
Creative financial strategies in real estate
Market trends and agent activities in 2023

problems_addressed.specific_problem: Impact of recent bank failures on mortgage rates
problems_addressed.solution_summary: Bank failures have led to lower mortgage rates due to increased bond market activity.
Use seller buy downs to lower rates temporarily, making homes more affordable.

problems_addressed.specific_problem: Agents struggling to connect with clients post-COVID
problems_addressed.solution_summary: Host small, meaningful client events and partner with mortgage lenders to share costs.

target_avatars.relevance: This episode provides strategies to enhance client engagement and close more deals.
target_avatars.key_takeaway: Utilize creative financial strategies and partnerships to navigate current market challenges.

target_avatars.relevance: Offers actionable tactics to improve client relationships and leverage market conditions.
target_avatars.key_takeaway: Focus on client events and seller buy downs to increase conversion rates.

clip_worthy_moments.quote: If you take that same $15,000 and have the seller buy the rate down for the client, their payment would drop four to $500 a month.
clip_worthy_moments.why_clipworthy: Provides a clear, actionable tactic to reduce monthly payments significantly.
clip_worthy_moments.suggested_hook: Want to save your clients hundreds on their mortgage payments?

clip_worthy_moments.quote: Go work with somebody that's willing to spend money on you... The first person that says yes, that's your person.
clip_worthy_moments.why_clipworthy: Encourages agents to seek mutually beneficial partnerships.
clip_worthy_moments.suggested_hook: Looking for a partner who invests in your success?

key_tactics.tactic: Use seller buy downs to lower mortgage rates temporarily.
key_tactics.context: Apply when negotiating with sellers to make homes more affordable for buyers.

key_tactics.tactic: Host client events and partner with mortgage lenders to share costs.
key_tactics.context: Engage clients and enhance relationships post-COVID.

quotable_insights: Date the rate, marry the home.
If you're not doing something, you're doing nothing.

resources_mentioned.name: Real Geeks
resources_mentioned.context: Recommended as a technology partner for real estate agents to generate more business.

episode_summary: In this episode, Joel Schaub discusses the impact of recent bank failures on mortgage rates and offers creative financial strategies like seller buy downs to make homes more affordable. He emphasizes the importance of client engagement through events and partnerships with mortgage lenders to navigate the challenging 2023 market effectively.
